document.full_text: costco wholesale corp  expanded its share buyback authorization and raised its dividend by 17 percent on tuesday, sending the retailer's shares up 0.8 percent in after-hours trade.
document.title: costco expands buyback plan, ups dividend
lines_and_colors: costco wholesale corp  expanded its share buyback authorization and raised its dividend by 17 percent on tuesday, sending the retailer's shares up 0.8 percent in after-hours trade.
